pages.text: Crafting these farms is simple.You need 9 Glass Panes, a pickaxe and the rock that you want it to generate For example, the Stone Farm is created with 9 Glass Panes on the outside, any level of Pickaxe in the Middle and Stone below that. Just like in Regular Gameplay, the kind of Pickaxe determines the "Mineing Speed"

Please note that at the moment Modded Pickaxes do work, but they will default to a Wooden Mining speed and you will be unable to upgrade them. As such, it's suggested to stick to vanilla Pickaxes. Support for Modded Pickaxes is a work in progress.
